textAfterTable: hint Myths/People/Culture Extra What was the lower class called? Patricians were upper class. France was called ____ in Roman times Gallia, in Latin. Caesar died on what day of what month? 'the Ides of ____' Name the 3 headed dog guarding the underworld? Which god guides the souls of the dead into the underworld? The 'messenger god' Who is the god of the underworld? Captures Persephone What was the monster living below King Minos' castle? He lived on Crete. What language was primarily spoken? It is now a dead language. Who was Rome named after? His brother was Remus, who he killed in a fit of anger. What was one of the rivers in the Underworld?
